dmca.title: Jalic Inc Issues Shakespearean Notice
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern: 

The following information is presented for the purposes of removing web content that infringes on our copyright per the Digital Millennium Copyright Act. We appreciate your enforcement of copyright law and support of our rights in this matter.

Identification of Copyrighted Work 
The copyrighted work at issue is the text that appears on http://www.online-literature.com/shakespeare/

Identification of Infringed Material 
The following query was used in Google. When a match was made to a site other than ours, we evaluated the extent of the copyright infringement. In all cases presented, entire paragraphs and/or pages have been copied. We have retained but not submitted printed examples of each infringement. 

Query# 1 
"Shakespeare attended the Christian Holy Trinity church"
http://www.google.com/search?q=%22Shakespeare+attended+the+Christian+Holy+Trinity+church%22&num=100&hl=en&safe=off&rls=GGLJ,GGLJ:2007-09,GGLJ:en&filter=0

The URLs of the infringing search results are as follows (With query numbers in parentheses): 
1. http://englishbox.blogfa.com/cat-4.aspx
Google Cache: http://64.233.167.104/search?q=cache:x9ay-NMIP54J:englishbox.blogfa.com/cat-4.aspx+%22Shakespeare+attended+the+Christian+Holy+Trinity+church%22&hl=en&ct=clnk&cd=3&gl=us
2. http://sexyworld1982.spaces.live.com/blog/cns!6DEAD56515644D57!215.entry
Google Cache:  http://64.233.167.104/search?q=cache:4dihFP3u4ToJ:sexyworld1982.spaces.live.com/blog/cns!6DEAD56515644D57!215.entry+%22Shakespeare+attended+the+Christian+Holy+Trinity+church%22&hl=en&ct=clnk&cd=4&gl=us
3. http://www.poetryconnection.net/poets/William_Shakespeare Google Cache: http://64.233.167.104/search?q=cache:EJIrx1kGFR8J:www.poetryconnection.net/poets/William_Shakespeare+%22Shakespeare+attended+the+Christian+Holy+Trinity+church%22&hl=en&ct=clnk&cd=16&gl=us 
4. http://it.answers.yahoo.com/rss/question?qid=20060719072326AAuRlgy Google 
Cache: http://64.233.167.104/search?q=cache:vTYfMrAJ3t8J:it.answers.yahoo.com/rss/question%3Fqid%3D20060719072326AAuRlgy+%22Shakespeare+attended+the+Christian+Holy+Trinity+church%22&hl=en&ct=clnk&cd=15&gl=us 
5. http://tlegend.blogspot.com/ Google Cache: http://64.233.167.104/search?q=cache:bmKLhbB7kVsJ:tlegend.blogspot.com/+%22Shakespeare+attended+the+Christian+Holy+Trinity+church%22&hl=en&ct=clnk&cd=7&gl=us 
6. http://www.national-front.org.uk/shakespeare.php Google Cache: http://64.233.167.104/search?q=cache:xl2k3rrguSIJ:www.national-front.org.uk/shakespeare.php+%22Shakespeare+attended+the+Christian+Holy+Trinity+church%22&hl=en&ct=clnk&cd=5&gl=us  

Copyright Owner Contact Information 
Jalic Inc
[Private]
[Private], East Lansing, MI 48823 USA
[Private]

Copyright Infringers Information 
 In most cases we were unable to figure out who the individuals were either because the infringements were anonymous postings or because of false WHOIS data. What follows are the ones we know with the corresponding number indicating which infringing site they own:

3. GB Internet Marketing
